textBlock1.title: Made with love üíú
textBlock1.text: At dnd-tracker, we are not of many words. We let the product speak for itself. What was an encounter tracker as a main idea quickly turned into a much bigger thing. With more and more ideas coming forward, we are currently expanding the dnd-tracker. This will make playing even more exciting, mysterious, easier AND more enjoyable.

summary.title: Why choose dnd-tracker for your encounters ü§î
summary.item2: We are constantly working to optimize the product
summary.item3: Everything in 1 convenient place for the DM
summary.item5: Plenty of information you can get your hands on
summary.item6: Attractive dark mode design for all vampires among us

textBlock2.title: Weird stuff üêõ
textBlock2.text: Because we are still in the start-up phase of this dnd tracker, sometimes mysterious errors may appear. Please don't hesitate and be sure to let us know so we can fix them quickly.

diceRoller.title: Roll with ease
diceRoller.text: A digital dice roller is a convenient tool that allows users to roll multiple dice of the same type with ease. With its fast and easy rolling capabilities, it's an essential tool for any tabletop gamer. For dungeon masters, it can significantly speed up their workflow, allowing them to focus more on storytelling and gameplay.

about.text1: Welcome to DnD-Tracker, your go-to destination for effortlessly managing your Dungeon and Dragons encounters! Our website was made with passion and dedication in Belgium, where we believe that playing D&D should be all about fun and adventure.
about.text2: At DnD-Tracker, we understand how hard it can be for Dungeon Masters to manage all the moving parts of an encounter. That's why we created a tool that makes it easy for them to focus on the adventure, while we do the heavy lifting for them.
about.text3: Our story began when a friend, who happened to be a Dungeon Master, asked us to make some macros for him in Excel. Unfortunately, we weren't very proficient with Excel, but we were determined to find a better solution. That's when we decided to create a website that would offer a more intuitive and user-friendly way to manage encounters.
about.text4: Our goal is to make the Dungeon Master's life as easy as possible, so they can spend more time creating engaging adventures and less time dealing with the logistics. With DnD-Tracker, you can effortlessly manage all aspects of your encounters, from initiative tracking to monster stats and more.
about.text5: We are constantly striving to improve our website and make it the best possible tool for Dungeon Masters everywhere. Whether you're a seasoned veteran or a new player just getting started, DnD-Tracker has everything you need to make your D&D experience even more enjoyable.
about.end: Thank you for choosing DnD-Tracker, and we hope you have a great time playing D&D!

homebrew.title: Ready to unleash your creativity?
homebrew.text: Start making your own homebrew today! With just a few inputs and some imagination, you can bring your unique ideas to life and add a personal touch to your campaign. Don't wait any longer, dive in and start creating your own one-of-a-kind items now!

pricing.title: Designed for the best dungeon masters, like you.
pricing.text: Affordable Prices, Quality Service. At DnD-Tracker, we believe in delivering high-quality service at a fair price. Our pricing plans are designed to fit your needs and budget. Choose the best option for you and enjoy a seamless experience with us. Get in touch with us today to learn more.
pricing.starter: Best option for getting to know the product. Best for dungeon masters with 1-3 running campaigns.
pricing.medior: Best option for the dungeon master with multiple active campaigns running at the same time.
pricing.pro: Best option for the professional dungeon masters and when you work with multiple DM's on the same campaigns.
